title: Daisy Edgar Jones and Karen Elson headline the 2021 Bazaar Summit: tickets on sale now
author: Marie-Claire Chappet
description: Our annual Bazaar At Work Summit is back - here's how you can get involved
cleaned_text: been dedicated to uplifting and inspiring women, something which is integral to the spirit of the brand. This is especially evident in our work to highlight female achievement and address the concerns and desires of working women. Our [Bazaar at Work](https://www.harpersbazaar.com/uk/people-parties/bazaar-at-work/) initiative, with dedicated weekly and monthly content, aims to inspire, empower, and inform our readers with the most exciting developments in the world of work. Which is why we are delighted to announce the return of our annual [ Bazaar at Work ](https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/bazaar-at-work-summit-2021-tickets-169828502623?aff=BURGERNAV)Summit. This is a full day of panels, speakers, interviews, interactive workshops and unmissable networking opportunities with Bazaar editors and truly visionary women from the worlds of finance, fashion, business, wellbeing, technology and more; all leaders and experts in their fields. Of course, this year's summit follows an extraordinary period of change. Our theme, 'A Fresh Start', will reflect this, and focus on how we recalibrate our work lives - from harnessing an entrepreneurial mindset to tackling the [working wardrobe](https://www.harpersbazaar.com/uk/fashion/g28897412/work-bags-women/). This year's summit will take place on Tuesday 23rd November 2021 at The Londoner, and we are honoured to have the groundbreaking actress [Daisy Edgar Jones](https://www.harpersbazaar.com/uk/culture/culture-news/a34519417/daisy-edgar-jones-interview-normal-people/) and the global supermodel Karen Elson as our headliners. They lead an inspiring roster of female thought-leaders, including the founder of Dermalogica, Jane Wurwand; the aerospace executive Jane Poynter; the entrepreneur Sharmadean Reid; and the [Royal Ballet principal Lauren Cuthbertson](https://www.harpersbazaar.com/uk/culture/entertainment/a38158131/lauren-cuthbertson-interview-stage-return/). We are also delighted to be working in partnership with UBS, YPO and Porsche. To purchase tickets, and for more information, click [here. ](https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/bazaar-at-work-summit-2021-tickets-169828502623?aff=ARTICLE) Kindly note that proof of double vaccination or a valid negative lateral flow test taken within 24 hours ahead of the event will be required to gain entry. *This event is only for people who are aged 18 and over - the legal age in the UK to consume and/or purchase alcoholic beverages.
